channel.title: Quentinau on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in Quentinau on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: PrestaShop + Azure: meet the team behind it all!
item.description: Our core team worked closely in the past few months with the Microsoft Azure Team to build 4 ready-to-use PrestaShop cloud hosting plans. You’re invited to discover an exclusive preview of it in Paris next week!

item.title: Test PrestaShop 1.7.0.0 alpha 3 now!
item.description: Here it is. After two internal alpha versions, we’re happy to present to you this public alpha release of PrestaShop 1.7.0.0 – the first in a series of public alpha/beta/RC versions that we intend to release over several weeks, in order to gather feedback and make sure that the final and stable version is the best it can be!

item.title: Meet the team building PrestaShop 1.7
item.description: These days, the product & dev open-space is quiet but the minds are working like crazy! We’re starting 2016 by giving a huge push on PrestaShop 1.7 and as you’ve read here, that includes a lot of important projects.
